metadata.title: CVE-2021-30846 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved memory handling. Thisissue is fixed in iOS 14.8 and iPadOS 14.8, Safari 15, tvOS 15, iOS 15 andiPadOS 15, watchOS 8. Processing maliciously crafted web content may leadto arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
webkit2gtk package in bionic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
